pli-tv-bu-vb-sk18:6.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk18:6.2: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū bāhuppacālakaṃ antaraghare nisīdanti bāhuṃ olambentā …
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk18:8.3: Yo anādariyaṃ paṭicca bāhuppacālakaṃ antaraghare nisīdati bāhuṃ olambento, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
